name: RecordsRescuing
_source: speak;;Rescuing a unit normally incurs a <red>-1 SPD</>/<red>SKL</> penalty!{w}{clear}However, these penalties are waived when a <blue>Trainee</> unit is rescued by a <blue>Non-Trainee</> unit!{w}{clear}Also...{w} Units can act after rescuing or any other associated action!;;;hint
